channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brazil's Supreme Court votes to convict ex-President Bolsonaro of a coup plot
item.description: A historic conviction: Brazil's Supreme Court delivers a majority vote to convict former President Jair Bolsonaro over a plot to overthrow the governm...

item.title: Jury trial of Ryan Routh, man accused of trying to kill Trump, begins in Florida
item.description: Routh is charged with attempting to assassinate a presidential candidate. A conviction carries a maximum penalty of life in prison. Routh, who is not ...

item.title: Charlie Kirk's assassination sparks grief and rage online
item.description: Some conservative influencers mourned Kirk's loss, even as others quickly blamed the left.

item.title: South Korean workers detained in immigration raid leave Atlanta and head home
item.description: A plane carrying more than 300 workers from South Korea who were detained during an immigration raid at a battery factory in Georgia last week left At...

item.title: Are hotel rooms accessible for people who use wheelchairs? NPR wants to hear from you
item.description: Hotels have accessible rooms for wheelchair users. If you or someone you know has experienced problems with those rooms, we'd like to hear about it.

item.title: Senate GOP moves on rules change after Dem warnings against going "nuclear"
item.description: Democrats ultimately pushed for more time to iron things out and secure support as the day stretched on, but Republicans refused.

item.title: Charlie Kirk shot and killed at Utah event; manhunt for shooter ongoing
item.description: Conservative activist and Turning Point USA co-founder Charlie Kirk died Wednesday after he was shot at an event at Utah Valley University.

item.title: Ryan Routh cut off by judge as trial in attempted Trump assassination begins
item.description: Routh, who is defending himself, addressed jurors during opening remarks Thursday before the judge said he was off-topic.

item.title: Belarus frees political prisoners in exchange for easing of US sanctions
item.description: Fifty-two prisoners have been released, but more than 1,000 political prisoners remain in jail.

item.title: How much can a $10,000 traditional savings account earn now (and is it worth opening)?
item.description: While it may be easy to deposit $10,000 into a traditional savings account, alternatives could be more lucrative.

item.title: FBI releases photos of person of interest in Charlie Kirk’s killing on a Utah university campus
item.description: The shooter who assassinated conservative activist Charlie Kirk and then vanished off a roof and into the woods is still at large more than 24 hours l...

item.title: Nato strengthens defences after Russian drones shot down over Poland
item.description: Germany, the Netherlands and the Czech Republic will be sending Poland more support to defend Nato's eastern flank.

item.title: Bolsonaro's coup trial gripped Brazil - and his conviction will divide the country
item.description: The ex-president's conviction is a milestone critics will welcome, though his punishment remains unclear.

item.title: Brazil's former President Bolsonaro found guilty of plotting coup
item.description: The right-wing former leader could be sentenced to decades in prison after he was convicted by Brazil's Supreme Court.

item.title: 8/7: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Higher U.S. tariffs take effect on dozens of countries; What to know about "buy now, pay later" services.

item.title: Assassination of Charlie Kirk adds to America’s roll call of public violence
Search for Charlie Kirk's killer continues. Here's what we know.
item.description: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was shot and killed on Wednesday while speaking an event at Utah Valley University. Authorities have not identified...

item.title: What to know about the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk
